mutants.original_line: s = ''.join(str(len(list(group))) + digit for digit, group in itertools.groupby(s))
mutants.mutated_line: s = 'MUTATED'.join((str(len(list(group))) + digit for (digit, group) in itertools.groupby(s)))

mutants.original_line: s = ''.join(str(len(list(group))) + digit for digit, group in itertools.groupby(s))
mutants.mutated_line: s = ''.join((str(len(list(group))) - digit for (digit, group) in itertools.groupby(s)))

mutants.original_line: s = ''.join(str(len(list(group))) + digit for digit, group in itertools.groupby(s))
mutants.mutated_line: s = ''.join((str(len(list(group))) * digit for (digit, group) in itertools.groupby(s)))
